Uses of Interface
org.springframework.messaging.rsocket.RSocketRequester

Packages that use RSocketRequester
Package
Description
org.springframework.messaging.rsocket
Support for the RSocket protocol.
org.springframework.messaging.rsocket.service
Annotations to declare an RSocket service contract with request methods along with a proxy factory backed by an RSocketRequester.

  • Uses of RSocketRequester in org.springframework.messaging.rsocket

    Methods in org.springframework.messaging.rsocket that return RSocketRequester
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    RSocketRequester
    RSocketRequester.Builder.tcp(String host, int port)
    Build an RSocketRequester with an RSocketClient that connects over TCP to the given host and port.
    RSocketRequester
    RSocketRequester.Builder.transport(ClientTransport transport)
    Variant of RSocketRequester.Builder.tcp(String, int) and RSocketRequester.Builder.websocket(URI) with an already initialized ClientTransport.
    RSocketRequester
    RSocketRequester.Builder.transports(Publisher<List<LoadbalanceTarget>> targetPublisher, LoadbalanceStrategy loadbalanceStrategy)
    Build an RSocketRequester with an LoadbalanceRSocketClient that will connect to one of the given targets selected through the given LoadbalanceRSocketClient.
    RSocketRequester
    RSocketRequester.Builder.websocket(URI uri)
    Build an RSocketRequester with an RSocketClient that connects over WebSocket to the given URL.
    static RSocketRequester
    RSocketRequester.wrap(RSocket rsocket, MimeType dataMimeType, MimeType metadataMimeType, RSocketStrategies strategies)
    Wrap an existing RSocket.
